common_errors.cause: File is not a valid object file or executable
common_errors.solution: Verify file type: file <binary>. size works on ELF, Mach-O, COFF.

common_errors.cause: File doesn't exist at specified path
common_errors.solution: Check filename and path. Use tab completion.
Check file permissions. May need sudo for system files.

common_errors.cause: Specified a directory instead of file
common_errors.solution: size operates on files. Use: size file or size dir/*.o

common_errors.cause: File header doesn't match expected format
common_errors.solution: File may be corrupted or in unsupported format. Check with: file <binary>

common_errors.cause: Binary is stripped (informational for size, still shows sizes)
common_errors.solution: This is informational. size still reports section sizes without symbols.
File may be corrupted or partially downloaded. Verify integrity.

common_errors.cause: File format not supported by this version of size
common_errors.solution: May need cross-platform binutils. Try objdump -h as alternative.
Check --target option. Use --help to see supported targets.
